query:
SELECT 
                ch.id as "id!",
                ch.name as "name!",
                ch.login as "login!",
                ch.color as "color!",
                ch.image as "image!",
                ch.total as "total!",
                ch.private as "private!",
                ch.ranking as "ranking!",
                (
                    SELECT COUNT(*)
                    FROM ranked_scores_view_per_channel 
                    WHERE channel_id = ch.id
                ) as "total_scores!",
                ch.created_at as "created_at!",
                ch.updated_at as "updated_at!"
            FROM chatter_leaderboard ch
            WHERE ch.id = $1
